QueryDefinition.Query: with a as ( SELECT distinct CONVERT(VARCHAR, PROV) PROVIDER, RTRIM(LTRIM(PROVCAT)) SPECIALTY_SOURCE FROM Medical UNION SELECT distinct CASE WHEN NPI is not null and DEA is not null THEN NPI+ '-' + DEA ELSE ISNULL(NPI, DEA) END as PROVIDER , NULL SPECIALTY_SOURCE FROM Rx ) SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(PROVIDER)) PROVIDER, SPECIALTY_SOURCE FROM a
